com.reportmill.text

Class RMTextEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • SnapObject
      • com.reportmill.text.RMTextEditor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RMTypes, RMTextTypes, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.lang.CharSequence, java.util.EventListener

    public class RMTextEditor
extends SnapObject
implements RMTextTypes, java.lang.CharSequence, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    This class provides all of the event and drawing code necessary to edit text in the form of an RMXString (separated from an actual UI Component).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RMTextEditor.TextSelection
      A class to act as text selection.
